title: Contemporary Scandinavia: common purposes, individual differences
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Norway - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Sweden - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Sweden - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Denmark - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Denmark - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Norway - Social life and customs
description: An overview of modern life in Denmark, Norway and Sweden. Describes their unique political organisation, stressing at the same time, national differences. Discusses the influence of both geography and modern technology on economic and social organisation, and Scandinavia's role in world affairs. Includes a sequence on youth and education.
